content:
We have a case' variant for writing unstructured proofs. However, it was still checking whether the goal was closed. I just pushed a commit that removes this check.
https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/commit/4eb2cfec466bfebfdca7633fce24e6b0f5cba68c

Thanks so much! That's exactly what I needed.

Just wanted to add how amazed I am at helpful everyone is, and how quick issues get resolved! It is much appreciated.
Alex Keizer has marked this topic as resolved.
